regular.name: villager
regular.description: The most commonplace role, a simple Villager, spends the game trying to root out who they believe the revenents (and other Villagers) are. While they do not need to lie, the role requires players to keenly sense and point out the flaws or mistakes of their fellow players. Someone is speaking too much? Could mean they're a revenent. Someone isn't speaking enough? Could mean the same thing. It all depends on the people you're playing with, and how well you know them.

action.day: Choose a villager that you suspect is a revenant.

healer.name: doctor
healer.description: Also a villager, the doctor has the ability to heal themselves or another villager when called awake by the Moderator during the night. Should they heal themselves, then will be safe from being killed by the revenents, or should they want to prove themselves the doctor or fear the death of a fellow villager, can opt to heal them instead. Again, the strategy here is up to you.

action.day: Choose a villager that you suspect is a revenant.

prophet.name: seer
prophet.description: The seer, while first and foremost a villager, has the added ability to see who the revenents are once night falls. When called awake by the Moderator, the seer can point to any of their fellow players and the Moderator must nod yes or no as to whether or not they are indeed a revenent. The seer can then choose to keep this information a secret during the day, or reveal themselves as the seer and use the knowledge they gained during the night in their defense or to their advantage during the day. The strategy here is up to you.

action.day: Choose a villager that you suspect is a revenant.
action.night: Choose a villager whom you wish to know their true identity.

antagonist.name: revenent
antagonist.description: Typically revenents are outnumbered by villagers 2 to 1. So a game of 6 players would have 2 revenents. The goal of the revenents is to decide together on one villager to secretly kill off during the night, while posing as villagers during the day so they're not killed off themselves. One by one they'll kill off villagers and win when there are either the same number of villagers and revenents left, or all the villagers have died. This role is the hardest of all to maintain, because these players are lying for the duration of the game.

action.day: Choose a villager that you suspect is a revenant.
